cenodude/CrossWatch

Synchronization engine for Plex, Jellyfin, Emby, and Trakt

View on index

Related repos

  • Syncs watch history across Jellyfin, Plex, and Emby
  • E-paper watch with open source hardware and software
  • syncs Plex watchlists with Sonarr and Radarr for automated media downloads
  • Remote desktop software with web client access
  • Watch command with time travel and diffs
  • AI client with local sync and plugin system
  • real-time Proxmox monitoring with alerts and webhooks
  • Self-hosted uptime monitoring solution built with Golang and React
  • Synchronizes Plex library with AniList profile
